concise_definition: v. 阅读, 朗读, 理解, 解读; n. 阅读量, 读数

definitions.explanation_en: To look at and understand the meaning of written or printed words, often for the purpose of gaining information or enjoyment.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指观看并理解书面或印刷文字的含义，通常是为了获取信息或享受阅读的乐趣。
definitions.example_en: She reads three novels every month to relax after work.
definitions.example_cn: 她每月读三本小说，以便在工作后放松。

definitions.explanation_en: To interpret or understand something that is not literally written, such as body language, signs, or subtle cues.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指解读非文字性的信息，如肢体语言、信号或细微的暗示。
definitions.example_en: He can read the room perfectly—he knows when people are uncomfortable.
definitions.example_cn: 他非常擅长察言观色——他知道什么时候人们感到不舒服。

definitions.explanation_en: To recite or speak aloud written text, often in a formal or educational setting.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在正式或教育场合中大声朗读书面文字。
definitions.example_en: The teacher asked the students to read the poem aloud.
definitions.example_cn: 老师让学生们大声朗读这首诗。

definitions.explanation_en: The number of times a piece of content (such as an article or post) has been viewed or accessed, especially online.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指某内容（如文章或帖子）被查看或访问的次数，尤其用于网络环境。
definitions.example_en: This blog post has over 10,000 reads since it was published.
definitions.example_cn: 这篇博客文章自发布以来已有超过一万次阅读。

definitions.explanation_en: A measurement displayed by a device, such as a gauge, meter, or instrument.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指仪表、计数器或其他设备上显示的读数。
definitions.example_en: The thermometer showed a temperature read of 38.5°C.

comparison.analysis: “Scans”（浏览/扫描）强调快速、表面地查看内容，通常不深入理解，如扫描新闻标题或文档。而 “reads” 暗示更专注、有理解力的阅读行为，涉及认知处理和意义建构。
“Interprets”（解释/诠释）侧重于对模糊、抽象或非语言信息进行分析和赋予意义，常用于艺术、法律或心理学语境。而 “reads” 在非文字语境中虽可互换，但更口语化、日常化，且常隐含直觉性理解。
“Studies”（研究/钻研）指系统性、长时间、深入地学习或分析某内容，通常伴随笔记、反思或批判性思考。而 “reads” 是更基础、更普遍的行为，不一定涉及深度分析。
